verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when Adonizedek<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> had heard<WH8085> how<WH3588> Joshua<WH3091> had taken<WH3920> Ai<WH5857>, and had utterly destroyed<WH2763> it; as he had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and her king<WH4428>, so he had done<WH6213> to Ai<WH5857> and her king<WH4428>; and how the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> had made peace<WH7999> with Israel<WH3478>, and were among<WH7130> them;

That they feared<WH3372> greatly<WH3966>, because Gibeon<WH1391> was a great<WH1419> city<WH5892>, as one<WH259> of the royal<WH4467> cities<WH5892>, and because it was greater<WH1419> than Ai<WH5857>, and all the men<WH582> thereof were mighty<WH1368>. royal: Heb. cities of the kingdom

Wherefore Adonizedek<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> sent<WH7971> unto Hoham<WH1944> king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, and unto Piram<WH6502> king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, and unto Japhia<WH3309> king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, and unto Debir<WH1688> king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>, saying<WH559>,
Come up<WH5927> unto me, and help<WH5826> me, that we may smite<WH5221> Gibeon<WH1391>: for it hath made peace<WH7999> with Joshua<WH3091> and with the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

Therefore the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, the king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, the king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>, gathered themselves together<WH622>, and went up<WH5927>, they and all their hosts<WH4264>, and encamped<WH2583> before Gibeon<WH1391>, and made war<WH3898> against it.

And the men<WH582> of Gibeon<WH1391> sent<WH7971> unto Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal<WH1537>, saying<WH559>, Slack<WH7503> not thy hand<WH3027> from thy servants<WH5650>; come up<WH5927> to us quickly<WH4120>, and save<WH3467> us, and help<WH5826> us: for all the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> that dwell<WH3427> in the mountains<WH2022> are gathered together<WH6908> against us.
So Joshua<WH3091> ascended<WH5927> from Gilgal<WH1537>, he, and all the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with him, and all the mighty<WH1368> men of valour<WH2428>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Fear<WH3372> them not: for I have delivered<WH5414> them into thine hand<WH3027>; there shall not a man<WH376> of them stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee.
Joshua<WH3091> therefore came<WH935> unto them suddenly<WH6597>, and went up<WH5927> from Gilgal<WH1537> all night<WH3915>.

And the LORD<WH3068> discomfited<WH2000> them before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>, and slew<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347> at Gibeon<WH1391>, and chased<WH7291> them along the way<WH1870> that goeth up<WH4608> to Bethhoron<WH1032>, and smote<WH5221> them to Azekah<WH5825>, and unto Makkedah<WH4719>.

And it came to pass, as they fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>, and were in the going down<WH4174> to Bethhoron<WH1032>, that the LORD<WH3068> cast down<WH7993> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> from heaven<WH8064> upon them unto Azekah<WH5825>, and they died<WH4191>: they were more<WH7227> which died<WH4191> with hailstones<WH1259> <WH68> than they whom<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> slew<WH2026> with the sword<WH2719>.

Then spake<WH1696> Joshua<WH3091> to the LORD<WH3068> in the day<WH3117> when the LORD<WH3068> delivered up<WH5414> the Amorites<WH567> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and he said<WH559> in the sight<WH5869> of Israel<WH3478>, Sun<WH8121>, stand thou still<WH1826> upon Gibeon<WH1391>; and thou, Moon<WH3394>, in the valley<WH6010> of Ajalon<WH357>. stand: Heb. be silent

And the sun<WH8121> stood still<WH1826>, and the moon<WH3394> stayed<WH5975>, until the people<WH1471> had avenged<WH5358> themselves upon their enemies<WH341>. Is not this<WH1931> written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of Jasher<WH3477>? So the sun<WH8121> stood still<WH5975> in the midst<WH2677> of heaven<WH8064>, and hasted<WH213> not to go down<WH935> about a whole<WH8549> day<WH3117>. Jasher: or, the upright?

And there was no day<WH3117> like that before<WH6440> it or after<WH310> it, that the LORD<WH3068> hearkened<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of a man<WH376>: for the LORD<WH3068> fought<WH3898> for Israel<WH3478>.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, unto the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal<WH1537>.
But these five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> fled<WH5127>, and hid<WH2244> themselves in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah<WH4719>.
And it was told<WH5046> Joshua<WH3091>, saying<WH559>, The five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> are found<WH4672> hid<WH2244> in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah<WH4719>.
And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559>, Roll<WH1556> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> upon the mouth<WH6310> of the cave<WH4631>, and set<WH6485> men<WH582> by it for to keep<WH8104> them:

And stay<WH5975> ye not, but pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> your enemies<WH341>, and smite the hindmost<WH2179> of them; suffer<WH5414> them not to enter<WH935> into their cities<WH5892>: for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath delivered<WH5414> them into your hand<WH3027>. smite: Heb. cut off the tail

And it came to pass, when Joshua<WH3091> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had made an end<WH3615> of slaying<WH5221> them with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347>, till they were consumed<WH8552>, that the rest<WH8300> which remained<WH8277> of them entered<WH935> into fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892>.

And all the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> to Joshua<WH3091> at Makkedah<WH4719> in peace<WH7965>: none moved<WH2782> his tongue<WH3956> against any<WH376> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
Then said<WH559> Joshua<WH3091>, Open<WH6605> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave<WH4631>, and bring out<WH3318> those five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto me out of the cave<WH4631>.

And they did<WH6213> so, and brought forth<WH3318> those five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto him out of the cave<WH4631>, the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275>, the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412>, the king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923>, and the king<WH4428> of Eglon<WH5700>.

And it came to pass, when they brought out<WH3318> those kings<WH4428> unto Joshua<WH3091>, that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478>, and said<WH559> unto the captains<WH7101> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> which went<WH1980> with him, Come near<WH7126>, put<WH7760> your feet<WH7272> upon the necks<WH6677> of these kings<WH4428>. And they came near<WH7126>, and put<WH7760> their feet<WH7272> upon the necks<WH6677> of them.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto them, Fear<WH3372> not, nor be dismayed<WH2865>, be strong<WH2388> and of good courage<WH553>: for thus shall the LORD<WH3068> do<WH6213> to all your enemies<WH341> against whom ye fight<WH3898>.

And afterward<WH310> Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them, and slew<WH4191> them, and hanged<WH8518> them on five<WH2568> trees<WH6086>: and they were hanging<WH8518> upon the trees<WH6086> until the evening<WH6153>.

And it came to pass at the time<WH6256> of the going down<WH935> of the sun<WH8121>, that Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680>, and they took them down<WH3381> off the trees<WH6086>, and cast<WH7993> them into the cave<WH4631> wherein they had been hid<WH2244>, and laid<WH7760> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in the cave's<WH4631> mouth<WH6310>, which remain until this very<WH6106> day<WH3117>.

And that day<WH3117> Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3920> Makkedah<WH4719>, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and the king<WH4428> thereof he utterly destroyed<WH2763>, them, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he let<WH7604> none remain<WH8300>: and he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Makkedah<WH4719> as he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405>.
Then Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Makkedah<WH4719>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, unto Libnah<WH3841>, and fought<WH3898> against Libnah<WH3841>:

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> it also, and the king<WH4428> thereof, into the hand<WH3027> of Israel<WH3478>; and he smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he let<WH7604> none remain<WH8300> in it; but did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> thereof as he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405>.
And Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Libnah<WH3841>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, unto Lachish<WH3923>, and encamped<WH2583> against it, and fought<WH3898> against it:

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> Lachish<WH3923> into the hand<WH3027> of Israel<WH3478>, which took<WH3920> it on the second<WH8145> day<WH3117>, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein, according to all that he had done<WH6213> to Libnah<WH3841>.

Then Horam<WH2036> king<WH4428> of Gezer<WH1507> came up<WH5927> to help<WH5826> Lachish<WH3923>; and Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> him and his people<WH5971>, until he had left<WH7604> him none remaining<WH8300>.
And from Lachish<WH3923> Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> unto Eglon<WH5700>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him; and they encamped<WH2583> against it, and fought<WH3898> against it:

And they took<WH3920> it on that day<WH3117>, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein he utterly destroyed<WH2763> that day<WH3117>, according to all that he had done<WH6213> to Lachish<WH3923>.
And Joshua<WH3091> went up<WH5927> from Eglon<WH5700>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, unto Hebron<WH2275>; and they fought<WH3898> against it:

And they took<WH3920> it, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all the cities<WH5892> thereof, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he left<WH7604> none remaining<WH8300>, according to all that he had done<WH6213> to Eglon<WH5700>; but destroyed<WH2763> it utterly, and all the souls<WH5315> that were therein.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, to Debir<WH1688>; and fought<WH3898> against it:

And he took<WH3920> it, and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all the cities<WH5892> thereof; and they smote<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and utterly destroyed<WH2763> all the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he left<WH7604> none remaining<WH8300>: as he had done<WH6213> to Hebron<WH2275>, so he did<WH6213> to Debir<WH1688>, and to the king<WH4428> thereof; as he had done<WH6213> also to Libnah<WH3841>, and to her king<WH4428>.

So Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> all the country<WH776> of the hills<WH2022>, and of the south<WH5045>, and of the vale<WH8219>, and of the springs<WH794>, and all their kings<WH4428>: he left<WH7604> none remaining<WH8300>, but utterly destroyed<WH2763> all that breathed<WH5397>, as the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> commanded<WH6680>.
And Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them from Kadeshbarnea<WH6947> even unto Gaza<WH5804>, and all the country<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>, even unto Gibeon<WH1391>.
And all these kings<WH4428> and their land<WH776> did Joshua<WH3091> take<WH3920> at one<WH259> time<WH6471>, because the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> fought<WH3898> for Israel<WH3478>.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned<WH7725>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him, unto the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal<WH1537>.
